ing: 1 (12 ounce) bottle hot pepper sauce (such as Frank's RedHotÂ®)
1 (1 ounce) package dry ranch dressing mix (such as Hidden Valley RanchÂ®)
2 (4 roll) packages Hawaiian buns, or as needed
n: Slow Cooker Spicy Buffalo Ranch Chicken
des: "Spicy buffalo chicken. Great for busy moms!"
ins:
Combine chicken, hot sauce, and ranch dressing mix together in a slow cooker.
Cook on Medium for 6 hours. Shred chicken and serve on buns.
